```{css echo = FALSE}
.column {
  float: left;
  width: 50%;
}

/* Clear floats after the columns */
.row:after {
  content: "";
  display: table;
  clear: both;
}
```


```{r echo = FALSE}
source(file.path("R", "functions.R"))

withTags(
  div(
    class = "row",
    div(class = "column",
        p("Hello this is the first column")),
    div(class = "column",
        p("Hello this is the second column"))
  )
)

```
